Uses of Interface
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ChannelHandler

Packages that use ChannelHandler
Package
Description
org.bluezoo.gumdrop
Core framework for the Gumdrop multipurpose Java server.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns
DNS server implementation for Gumdrop.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp
FTP (File Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http
HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2 server implementation.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.client
Non-blocking HTTP client with an event-driven handler pattern.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.file
Static file serving for the HTTP server.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap
IMAP4rev2 server implementation for Gumdrop.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client
Asynchronous LDAP client for Gumdrop's non-blocking I/O framework.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3
POP3 (Post Office Protocol version 3) server implementation.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.redis.client
Asynchronous Redis client for Gumdrop's non-blocking I/O framework.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet
Servlet 4.0 container implementation.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.session
HTTP session management and cluster replication.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp
SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implementation.

    Abstract base class for TCP protocol handlers.

    A server that binds to a UDP port and handles datagrams.

    Abstract base class for line-based TCP protocol handlers.
